lines.text: I mean... these guys were really old, by the looks of it.
I don't know if they could even remember what year it was, much less set up a ritual like that.
Come on, that's bunk. There's no way they weren't senile!
I'm afraid I can't back you up with that, kid.
As an old fogey myself, I gotta stand in solidarity with my fellow geezers.
Dude, come on, you're not even forty!
Don't mean I'm liable to condone disrespectin' our elders. Try another tack.
